message: Let's divide fairly, considering the inflation, I get a bit more
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your previous offer was too low. This is a more reasonable starting point for negotiation.
Considering the increasing inflation impact on your gain, I'm adjusting my offer accordingly
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The inflation is hurting me, but I'm trying to be fair. This is my final offer unless you significantly improve yours.
